Good Intro to Ruby Code

11 Dec 2009

I came across another good resource for learning Ruby. On Twitter, @lazycoder retweeted a link from @sintaxi that mentioned a new github repository for learning Ruby syntax and code. You can find it here: http://github.com/sintaxi/learn-ruby. I recently received a license to the copy of RubyMine from JetBrains that I won. I haven't used it much, but it seems to be a really good Ruby editor. The best part is pointing it to a git repository and opening it up with almost zero setup and no command line.
